testcase.name: Test dashboard page after login
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters username as "Admin" as password as "admin123"..............passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then dashboard page should be displayed.....................................passed And dashboard page should have 11 menu items as below.......................passed

testcase.name: Test title of login page
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user gets the title of the page........................................passed Then the page title should be "OrangeHRM"...................................passed

testcase.name: Test Forgot your password
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed Then forgot your password link should be displayed..........................passed

testcase.name: Test login of orange hrm
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters username as "Admin" as password as "admin123"..............passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then dashboard page should be displayed.....................................passed
